name: Inspirationalthoughts
0:
”Alexa, open Inspirational thoughts”
”Alexa, launch Inspirational Thoughts”
”Alexa, start Inspirational Thoughts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspirational thoughts
des:
Inspirational thoughts that are full of actual life experiences to encourage, to give hope, and to inspire. Start your day with encouragement and inspiration; wisdom from people of all walks of life.

Inspirational quotes have an amazing ability to motivate others and change the way we feel about ourselves. ... Just as positive words can make someone smile or a well-timed humorous quote can make someone laugh, our thoughts react to the world in real-time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
